name: Seed (Developer On Trip)
description:
*How To Play*

1- buy seeds from the shop down in the bottom

2-plant it in the farmland in the Center  

3-wait until it GROW then take it

4- go to the shop in the top right of the screen and sale the vegetables and get money to buy more seeds

A game about farming made for the Kenney Game jam 2022 in 48h

Music :

https://freesound.org/people/Migfus20/sounds/625056/

https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/339326/
